name: funny-calendar-filler
description: A Node.js web app that creates fake calendar events using Google Calendar API

scripts.dev:full: concurrently "pnpm run dev" "cd frontend && pnpm run dev"
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run build && echo 'Production build ready in frontend/dist'
scripts.clean: rm -f token.json server-backup.js && rm -rf frontend/dist frontend/node_modules
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd frontend && pnpm install
